file_content.text:
[Brushing the leaf mold from this old datapad, you realize it is the journal of one of the first Republic explorers of Voss. The most legible entry reads as follows:]
Weeks aboard the ship, and we step out into this wonderland. Never seen anywhere so lovely. Smells so alive.
Ran into a native scouting party yesterday. They weren't pleased to see us; even took a shot at Captain Janney.
I'll try and keep notes however busy we get. This is the chance of a lifetime, angry natives or not.
[It may be worth seeking out the other datapads left by the explorers.]
